name: Olaf's Night Before Christmas Quiz | Kid Lit Authors A - K | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "Olaf's Night Before Christmas", who had the smallest stocking hung up on the chimney?
questions.explanation:
Olaf.

	There were four stockings hung up on the chimney, belonging to Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven. Anna's stocking was the longest, Olaf's stocking was the shortest, and Sven's stocking was shaped like a reindeer hoof.

questions.text: When Olaf saw the stockings hung on the fireplace in "Olaf's Night Before Christmas", what did he wonder they were there for?
questions.correct: He wondered if the stockings were wet
options: He wondered if the stockings were cold
He wondered if the stockings smelled like feet
He wondered if the fireplace needed a hug
questions.explanation:
He wondered if the stockings were wet.

	Olaf wondered if the stockings were wet and the others hung the stockings up near the fireplace to dry them.

questions.text: What was Anna doing on the night before Christmas in "Olaf's Night Before Christmas"?
questions.explanation:
Snoring.

	Elsa was sleeping peacefully while Anna was snoring in her bed. Meanwhile, Olaf was counting sheep in his bed.

questions.text: After Olaf heard a noise over the fjord, what did he grab to look out at the sky in "Olaf's Night Before Christmas"?
questions.explanation:
Icicle.

	Olaf was awoken by a noise over the fjord and ran to his window. He used an icicle off the window pane to see what was in the sky. Olaf thought he was seeing Kristoff with eight Svens.

questions.text: When Santa landed on the castle roof in "Olaf's Night Before Christmas", how did Olaf know it wasn't Kristoff?
questions.correct: The jolly man smelled too nice
options: The jolly man was too big
questions.explanation:
The jolly man smelled too nice.

	Olaf watched the man come down the chimney feet first and then his entire body came into the room. Olaf knew it wasn't Kristoff because the man smelled like cookies, snowballs, and spices.

questions.text: In "Olaf's Night Before Christmas", what did Santa pause to eat before he put packages under the tree?
questions.explanation:
Krumkake.

	Olaf wondered if the gifts came from Old Oaken's store when he saw Santa's bag of gifts. He watched Santa put gifts in the stockings of Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, and Sven along with gifts under the Christmas tree. Anna and Elsa had set out eight Krumkake's for Santa along with a jug of milk.  Krumkake is a Norwegian tubular cookie filled with cream.

questions.text: In "Olaf's Night Before Christmas", did Olaf stay hidden from Santa?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After watching Santa put presents in the stockings and under the tree, Olaf tugged on Santa's jacket and introduced himself as Olaf and told Santa he liked warm hugs.

questions.text: What item did Olaf see Santa put into Anna's stocking in "Olaf's Night Before Christmas"?
questions.explanation:
Candy Canes.

	Olaf hid behind a chair while Santa filled Anna's stocking and put presents under the tree.

questions.text: In "Olaf's Night Before Christmas", what gift was Olaf holding as he watched Santa take off with his reindeer?
questions.explanation:
Snow globe.

	Santa gave Olaf a warm hug before leaving the castle and as Olaf watched Santa ride off into the night, Olaf was holding the snow globe with the Arendelle castle inside it.

questions.text: The 2015 US edition of "Olaf's Night Before Christmas" came with a CD narrated by Olaf.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Josh Gad voices the character of Olaf in the movie "Frozen" and narrates the book on a CD wrapped in front of the book.
